texts.value: Mono-ADP-ribosyltransferase that mediates mono-ADP-ribosylation of target proteins (PubMed:16061477, PubMed:25043379, PubMed:25635049). Acts as a negative regulator of transcription (PubMed:16061477)

features.description: Slightly reduces catalytic activity. Abolishes activity; when associated with Y-559 and C-604.
